com.microsoft.azure.storage.table

Class TableServiceException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.microsoft.azure.storage.StorageException
          • com.microsoft.azure.storage.table.TableServiceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class TableServiceException
extends StorageException
    An exception that results when a table storage service operation fails to complete successfully.
    See Also:

        public TableOperation getOperation()

        public boolean isRetryable()
        Reserved for internal use. Gets a flag indicating the table operation can be retried.
        Returns:
